SourceString: Although it's long abandoned the fortress of White Wall still stands against Ruin. After centuries of silence some groups of unexpected visitors broke the loneliness of the decaying city.
Comment: map desc when the player can select the episode
subtitle of the ending panel when player finishes this episode

SourceString: What happened beyond the portal is another story, which will be told at another time.
Comment: short text on the ending panel when player finishes this episode

SourceString: After months of researching I found a way to return back to the Ruined Realm. Ironically enough I have to use the same body I was trapped in before. I'll need to be quick and clever for this might be my very last chance to stop Ruin before it devours the World.
What happens when you lock a mighty demon's spirit inside a ball body?
Thanks for playing the game, we hope you had a great time!
Are you fast enough to race against Darkness itself?
"And as Darkness spreads an unknown Warriorb will rise..."
